subject: Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: At age 46, Roald Bradstock did not qualify for Sunday’s final in the javelin at the United States Olympic track and field trials. His aim now is to combine art and sport for fun.
snippet: At age 46, Roald Bradstock did not qualify for Sunday’s final in the javelin at the United States Olympic track and field trials. His aim now is to combine art and sport for fun.
